page.title: 07FARMING IN PARTNEY
page.content: On my farm we have 5 tractors.Tractors are very powerful machines that pull things.We have 3 workers.My Uncle John, his son Martin and my Dad.My farm is small. We have 11 sheds and my house. We rear sheep and cows.In the spring we are very busy with the sheep because they are lambing.Our main crops are sugar beat,wheat,barley, potatoes and peas.In August we harvest some of the crops mainly wheat and barley. In Autumn we harvest the potatoes,peas and sugar beat. In Summer my Dad reaps the grass to make hay to feed the animals in the Winter because there is no grass for them to eat.
